page.title: 18CASTLETOWN CHILD'S DIET
page.content: All have breakfast,cereal being most popular ,followed in second place by toast or morning rolls (softies).Only one cooked breakfast was recorded.Tea is the most popular drink.Of the 20 children,from 11-15 have school{lunch} ,one takes a packed lunch and the remainder have home lunch.School lunch consists of two courses and there is some choice in both courses.A packed lunch usually consists of sandwiches, biscuits and a fruit drink.Home lunches tend to be snacks such as soup,eggs,sandwiches etc.Half have a two course{dinner}at 6.00 pm and half have a Scottish {high tea}of one main course with toast and baking. {Snacks }, usually crisps, are eaten at playtime.At 3.30 pm snacks of sweets and frozen drinks are eaten by those children with access to a shop.
